titles.title: A resolution expressing support for designation of March as "National Whole Child Month".
A resolution expressing support for designation of March as "National Whole Child Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of March as National Whole Child Month.
Recognizes that ensuring that all children are healthy, safe, engaged, supported, and challenged is a national priority.
Encourages parents, educators, and community members to support and provide a whole child approach to education for each student.
